bioconda.name: bioconductor-msnbase
bioconda.summary: Base Functions and Classes for Mass Spectrometry and Proteomics

biocontainers.name: msnbase
biocontainers.summary: MSnbase is an R/Bioconductor package that provides infrastructure for plotting, manipulation and processing mass spectrometry and proteomics data.

biotools.summary: Basic plotting, data manipulation and processing of MS-based Proteomics data.

bioschemas.name: MSnbase
bioschemas.summary: Basic plotting, data manipulation and processing of MS-based Proteomics data.

galaxy.summary: MSnbase provides infrastructure for manipulation, processing and visualisation of mass spectrometry and proteomics data, ranging from raw to quantitative and annotated data.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Basic plotting, data manipulation and processing of MS-based Proteomics data.
